services.title: Weight Management Consultation
services.shortDescription: Comprehensive weight management programs tailored to your lifestyle and health goals.
services.fullDescription: Our weight management consultation provides a holistic approach to achieving and maintaining a healthy weight. We analyze your current health status, dietary habits, lifestyle factors, and create personalized plans that are sustainable and effective.
services.idealFor: Individuals looking to lose, gain, or maintain weight

services.title: Nutrition for Chronic Conditions
services.shortDescription: Specialized nutritional guidance for managing diabetes, hypertension, and other chronic conditions.
services.fullDescription: Managing chronic conditions through nutrition requires specialized knowledge and careful planning. Our consultations focus on using food as medicine to help control symptoms, prevent complications, and improve quality of life.
services.idealFor: Patients with diabetes, hypertension, thyroid issues

services.title: Sports Nutrition
services.shortDescription: Fuel your body optimally for athletic performance and recovery.
services.fullDescription: Whether you're a professional athlete or a weekend warrior, proper nutrition is key to optimal performance. We create customized nutrition plans that enhance energy levels, support muscle recovery, and maximize training results.

services.title: Prenatal & Postnatal Nutrition
services.shortDescription: Comprehensive nutritional support for expecting and new mothers.
services.fullDescription: Pregnancy and postpartum periods require special nutritional attention. We provide guidance on nutrient needs, morning sickness management, gestational diabetes prevention, and postpartum recovery through optimal nutrition.

services.title: Corporate Wellness Programs
services.shortDescription: Healthy eating programs designed for workplace wellness and productivity.
services.fullDescription: We design comprehensive nutrition programs for companies looking to improve employee health, reduce absenteeism, and boost productivity through better nutrition education and meal planning.

services.title: Child & Adolescent Nutrition
services.shortDescription: Specialized nutrition guidance for growing children and teenagers.
services.fullDescription: Proper nutrition during childhood and adolescence is crucial for growth, development, and establishing healthy eating habits. We address picky eating, growth concerns, and nutritional needs for optimal development.
